Inviting tiny pizzeria mid-way between Liceu and Jaume I on Carrer de Ferran in Bario Gotico.  Famished, we stumbled past early one evening on the way back from the beach.  A 1/8-slice of a sheet pan, call it 10cm x 15cm, goes for 4.65 euros (I think?).  We hit it twice for take-away; the second piece better than the first - jamon y champignones.  So.  Good.  Seating is limited.  Service is functional, if not friendly.
